name: VVAV ONE
description:
Original rhythm game VVAV ONE release on STEAM!
New music game for everyone!



-Various track presented by SINKERSIX


Luxurious track including first rhythm game apearance of [Four Gods] series!
New hot songs from other artists coming after!


-Who will be the last man?


Who will going to survive in the mission?
Must survive through various mission zone!
